team.title: CEO
team.name: Azamat Sultanov
team.bioHtml: dynamic entrepreneur open for a new challenge

jobs.title: Senior Developer/CTO
jobs.description:
Fortu is a fintech project developed by asset managers with over 10 years of experience in private banking, with extensive knowledge and experience in compliance and risk mitigation, insight in issues of banking sector and regulatory trends and a strong UHNWI client base. Following years of work in banking industry a niche to serve EU companies with non EU based beneficiaries, has been identified. We created an idea of an e-wallet solution, in compliance with the regulatory requirements, assigning individual approach to each client and account to mitigate risk and allow clients to run day to day payments to run their business.

We are looking for CTO/Senior Developer to provide strong technical leadership in developing our idea into a sound product. You will communicate with all the stakeholders and partners to ensure our product is working for everyone’s benefit.

We are based in London's biggest Fintech Hub - Level39

Responsibilities/Duties

Establish the project’s technical vision and leads all aspects of the project’s technological development
Discover and implement new technologies that yield competitive advantage
Supervise system infrastructure to ensure functionality and efficiency
Build quality assurance and data protection processes
Use stakeholders’ feedback to inform necessary improvements and adjustments to technology
Communicate technology strategy to partners and investors
Ensure technical architecture of finance team is consistent with roadmap/principles
We are looking for

Candidate with experience in FinTech
Hands on senior core developer/engineer to lead the Core Banking platform
Ideal candidate will have system architecture experience in a financial services domain and will have worked in a start-up environment
Experience building scalable systems
Knowledge of Go and Python language
Cloud computing
Abilities

Ability to think and act strategically and proactively
Knowledge of fintech trends to build strategy
Ability to conduct technological analyses and research
Leadership and organizational abilities
Strategic thinking
Problem-solving aptitude
Job Type: Full-time

Job Type: Full-time
